column5: Took the wife and 2 of the boys out tonight for some walleye.The stepson caught a nice 2.9 lb one and I messed up landing the youngest ones' walleye at the side of the boat.If I had to venture a guess it was about 6 to 7 lbs.Boy was he mad..poor bugger,oh well still a fun night.  Bassman
Nice report, He won't let you forget that loss....EVER  !!   Rob C
He'll be reminding you of that when you're 93 ! Good to get out with the family for sure...and fish to boot!
Better you that lost it than him... atleast he has someone to blame... lol  Sounds like you had a wonderful evening and your stepson looks very happy.  Way to go!!  Cheers,  Jen
Ya i'm sure I'll be hearing about that one for a while.It was great out there tonight,almost like glass.  Bassman
Great report. Those pickeral look delicious.
